bug_report.description: When attempting to save changes to a user's profile, an error occurs and the changes are not saved.

steps.step: Navigate to the user's profile page.

bug_report.expected_result: The changes to the user's profile should be saved successfully.
bug_report.actual_result: An error message appears and the changes are not saved.
bug_report.additional_info: The error message displayed is 'Unable to save changes to user profile. Please try again later.'
